casebody.data:
IN RE PROBATE APPEAL OF Cody B. HEISINGER Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 22, 2016

Ralph P. Dupont, in support of the petition.

Linda L. Morkan and Christopher J. Hug, in opposition.

The petition by the plaintiff Cody B. Heisinger for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 168 Conn.App. 467, 147 A.3d 1123 (2016), is denied.

ROGERS, C.J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
